title: Game keeps crashing frequently
body: Today i was playing Ascension and i had fun. The fun ended until my client "stopped working." So then i re-logged and played. After the match i played a few games without crashing. Then when i was playing a normal i crashed again(stopped working). So i re-logged again and played. After that i  played another game with my friend and Skyped with him. After champ select and the game starts to load . I suddenly wasnt loading. I tried alt-tabbing, but no loading. My friend had loaded in but i didnt. For a few minutes in, my teammates decide remake. Meanwhile my client was not working. Then the game had ended and I'm now in low priority queue. I exited out and repaired my client. So does anyone have a solution to my problem? Please i need help!! Thanks :)

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is disconnecting from the game platform. Most of the time, this is caused by network configurations that prevent a good connection from being maintained. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if those changes resolved your issue or not.
